# Consented AI

> Court-ready forensic evidence for deepfake cases.

## What We Do

Consented AI builds documented, explainable evidence packages for deepfake cases. We detect unauthorized AI-generated likenesses, attribute them to specific models and platforms, and produce chain-of-custody documentation that holds up in court.

## Who We Serve

- Attorneys handling deepfake litigation
- Talent management and entertainment firms
- Content removal and brand protection companies
- Individuals whose likeness has been used without consent

## Key Pages

- Homepage: https://www.consentedai.com
- Legal Landscape (AI likeness rights by state): https://www.consentedai.com/legal-landscape
- Developer API: https://www.consentedai.com/developers
- Sign Up: https://www.consentedai.com/signup
